title: Common | Ep 52  | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Common | Ep 52  | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
Episode 52 of All The Smoke is here and rapper Common joins Matt and Stephen to discuss his activism and the importance of voting. The boys also talk basketball, MJ, and music.
